substrings = [re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', substring) for substring in substrings]

mutants.original_line: substrings = [re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', substring) for substring in substrings]
mutants.mutated_line: substrings = [re.sub('', '', substring) for substring in substrings]

mutants.original_line: substrings = [re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', substring) for substring in substrings]
mutants.mutated_line: substrings = [re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', substring) for substring in substrings]
